scripts.cypress:run:cart: npx cypress run --headless --spec cypress/e2e/cart.cy.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=cart-report
scripts.cypress:run:inventory: npx cypress run --headless --spec cypress/e2e/inventory.cy.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=inventory-report
scripts.cypress:run:login: npx cypress run --headless --spec cypress/e2e/login.cy.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=login-report
scripts.cypress:run:api-cart: npx cypress run --headless --spec cypress/e2e/api-cart.cy.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=api-cart-report
scripts.cypress:run:lighthouse: npx cypress run --headless --spec cypress/e2e/lighthouse.cy.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=lighthouse-report
